resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
wesm commented on pull request #5700: ARROW-6938: [Packaging][Python] Disable bz2 and zstd in Windows wheels to triage linking issues
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5700
 
 
   If this fixes the wheel, I will open a follow up issue for an enterprising developer to re-enable these compressors. 
   
   I don't know why this is a problem for these codecs and not the others.

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
I found this out by using Dependency Walker on the wheel at

https://ci.appveyor.com/project/Ursa-Labs/crossbow/builds/28212818/artifacts

This simplest mitigation is to disable these codecs
fields.summary: [Python] Windows wheel depends on zstd.dll and libbz2.dll, which are not bundled
